conventional.name: Conventional Gravity System
conventional.description: A standard system using gravity to move effluent through a septic tank and into a gravel-and-pipe drain field. Requires suitable soil and a sloped yard.

chamber.name: Chamber System
chamber.description: Uses interlocking plastic chambers instead of gravel in the drain field. Requires less space and is ideal where gravel is scarce or expensive.

aerobic.name: Aerobic Treatment Unit (ATU)
aerobic.description: An advanced system that uses oxygen to treat wastewater to a higher quality. Necessary for poor soil, small lots, or near sensitive water bodies.

mound.name: Mound System
mound.description: A raised drain field built with specific sand fill. Required for high water tables, shallow bedrock, or very poor soil where other systems won't work.

pump_replacement.name: Effluent Pump Replacement
pump_replacement.description: Replacement of a failed pump in systems that require one (e.g., mound, drip, some advanced systems).

baffle_repair.name: Inlet/Outlet Baffle Repair
baffle_repair.description: Repairing or replacing the baffles inside the septic tank that direct flow and prevent solids from escaping.

drainfield_jetting.name: Drain Field Hydro-Jetting
drainfield_jetting.description: A procedure to clear clogged drain field lines with high-pressure water to attempt to restore function.

tank_lid_replacement.name: Tank Lid/Riser Replacement
tank_lid_replacement.description: Replacing a cracked or unsafe septic tank lid or adding a riser to bring access to the surface.

pumping.name: Routine Tank Pumping (3-5 years)
pumping.description: Standard removal of accumulated solids and sludge from the septic tank.

inspection.name: Full System Inspection
inspection.description: A comprehensive visual inspection of all system components, often done when buying or selling a home.

filter_cleaning.name: Effluent Filter Cleaning (Annual)
filter_cleaning.description: Cleaning the filter on the outlet of the septic tank to prevent clogs in the drain field.

atu_service_contract.name: Aerobic System Service (Annual)
atu_service_contract.description: Mandatory annual or semi-annual service for Aerobic Treatment Units to ensure proper function.
